glsa.title: FFmpeg: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in FFmpeg, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in FFmpeg. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
gst-plugins-libav is affected because this package is bundling a vulnerable FFmpeg version.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system using FFmpeg to process a specially crafted file, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
